author: decentralizeddonut
content: My understanding is that "The Merge", as a discrete point, is more of an MVP of the move from PoW to PoS, and will not include sharding.

author: chrollobaby
content: The roadmap for "2.0" (apparently we're trying to get rid of that naming convention and replace it with just Ethereum again, w/ distinctions being made between Consensus (proof of stake) and Execution (creating new blocks) layer) includes sharding. That's supposed to be the next development goal after the merge.
